summary: This document is an email chain forwarding citizen correspondence referencing Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell from the DOJ's Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The correspondence is being added to case file NTW 3500 for consideration.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced in citizen correspondence forwarded to the U.S. Attorney's Office for consideration in relation to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in citizen correspondence forwarded to the U.S. Attorney's Office for consideration.

keyFacts: The DOJ's Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section received citizen correspondence referencing Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The correspondence was forwarded to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York for consideration.
The forwarded material was to be added to case file NTW 3500.
The standard response to the citizen was to advise them to contact the FBI.
